text: ataṟkavaṉ ‘‘inta veḷḷa(p piraḷaya)ttiliruntu eṉṉaik kāppāṟṟakkūṭiya oru malaiyiṉ mēl nāṉ ceṉṟu viṭuvēṉ'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉāṉ. Ataṟkavar ‘‘allāh aruḷ purintālaṉṟi avaṉuṭaiya kaṭṭaḷaiyiliruntu pātukāttuk koḷḷa iṉṟu oruvarālum muṭiyātu'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉār. (Accamayam) avarkaḷukku iṭaiyil ōr alai eḻumpi kuṟukkiṭṭatu; avaṉum mūḻkiyavarkaḷuṭaṉ mūḻkiviṭṭāṉ
